reviews.text: I stayed overnight in this hotel a week ago and cannot believe how it could have a 5 Star rating.
reviews.title: Not 5 Star Hotel - not by a long shot!

reviews.text: My room was lovely and delightfully quiet but my sister's room was worn, tatty with lightbulbs missing and fittings hanging loose over the bed and a huge worn area in the carpet inside the door. We phoned ahead from the airport to ask how late food was served and were told it was served til 11pm. On arrival before 10pm the waiter in the foyer told us that the kitchen closed at 10pm. We insisted that we had been told otherwise on the phone half an hour beforehand and eventually got Spag Bol and Veg Lasagne served to us with very little grace.
reviews.title: Good comfortable hotel in Brussels

reviews.text: The hotel does NOT have a Bar and a sullen waiter reluctantly carried out drinks to my group.There was difficulty in getting a cup of tea without seeming to be an intrusion and being told the kitchen was closed during the afternoon when our group needed tea. Breakfast was great, lovely food buffet. There is no diningroom as such, the food being served in what is basically a corridor / foyer. How can a hotel have 5 Stars when it has no Bar and no proper diningroom and restricted hours of service? The location of the hotel is excellent.
reviews.title: Great hotel! Excellent choice!

reviews.text: This is a very good compact yet comfortable hotel in Brussels
reviews.title: Ok but tired

reviews.text: Easy access, not far from the airport and from Businesses and Offices
reviews.title: Good hotel
